name: Process Improvement

title: '[PROCESS] '
labels: process

---

## Current Process Pain Point

Describe the current aspect of the review process that could be improved. What friction or inefficiency exists?

## Suggested Improvement

Describe your proposed improvement to the review process. Be specific about what should change and how it would work.

## Expected Benefits

What benefits would this improvement bring? Consider:
- Time savings
- Quality improvements
- Better collaboration
- Reduced friction
- Clearer communication

## Implementation Considerations

What needs to be considered when implementing this change?
- Required changes to documentation
- Tool or automation needs
- Training or onboarding updates
- Transition plan from current process
- Potential risks or downsides
